cpl.readme:
@@color:red;''Highly experimental - no support available. Use at your own risk.''@@ 

* PUT support for the files directory on node.js. Allows the PUT uploader to be used with ~TiddlyWiki on node.js
** Enables PUT requests to save files to the `files` directory that is server by the TW node.js server
* The directory for uploaded files must be set to `files` (the default).
cpl.title: $:/plugins/sq/node-files-PUT-support
cpl.author: Saq Imtiaz
cpl.name: Node.js files PUT uploader support
cpl.description: EXPERIMENTAL node.js support for PUT uploader
title: Plugin_202203305708836
